medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient noted a bloated feeling and generalized abdominal discomfort. Symptoms began on an unspecified date. Pain worsened with straining. No nausea, vomiting, or appetite. Normal bowel movements. No fevers or chills.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, Depression, Hyperlipidemia, Gouty arthritis, Previous surgeries include tonsillectomy, vasectomy, laparoscopic bilateral inguinal hernia repair, umbilical hernia repair (no mesh), neck cyst excision.
